summary: While on a mission in Afghanistan, French captain Antarès Bonassieu's men start vanishing one by one without explanation.
cast: Jérémie Renier|Swann Arlaud|Marc Robert|Kévin Azaïs|Finnegan Oldfield|Christophe Tek|Clément Bresson|Sâm Mirhosseini|Édouard Court|Steve Tientcheu|Hamidreza Djavdan|Aria Faghih Habibi|Seyed Jafar Mirhosseini|Dean Mirhosseini|Yashar Vah|Patrick Ligardes|Michaël Vander-Meiren|Chloé Astor|Amir Hedayati|Kamal Ait Taleb|Yassin El Gouchari|Mahdi Chrismaens|Victor Pontecorvo|Olivier Courtemanche|Mohamed Rafik|Abdelilah Wahbi|Chafik Elaidi
title: Ni le ciel ni la terre
